page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: Hobbies and Leisure near Newbridge In our area the main leisure places are Norwood Community and Kirkliston Community wing.When local people go to the Community wings.They play football and watch T.V.Older male teenagers go to the Newbridge Inn to drink.The girls go to discos.The primary boys play football and BMXing.A BMX is a stunt bike.The girls play badminton, read and walk about.Secondary pupils usually play football and spectate at league matches in Edinburgh and Glasgow.Secondary girls usually go to youth clubs and guides and like drama. Male adult leisure activities include,football,running,snooker,pool, darts and golf.Female adults read,watch the soaps on T.V.and knit.
